Creating Company Object In DB.
createCompany(Company) - Method in class CouponSystemProjectJB.CoupoSystemFinalProject.services.AdminServiceImpl
Create Comapny A method that receives a company validates that there is no company with the same name/email in the system and then uses the CompanyRepository.Class to save the company in the date base .
CreateCompany(Company) - Method in class CouponSystemProjectJB.CoupoSystemFinalProject.webServices.AdminWebService
Create Comapny A method that receives a company (JSON) from client in the Request Body - and creates a Company In the DB using the AdminServiceImplantion.class
createCoupon(long, Coupon) - Method in interface CouponSystemProjectJB.CoupoSystemFinalProject.services.CompanyService
Creating Coupon In the DB.
createCoupon(long, Coupon) - Method in class CouponSystemProjectJB.CoupoSystemFinalProject.services.CompanyServiceImpl
Create Coupon A method that receives a coupon validates it (in The Entity itself - Using "lombok" library) sets its company and uses the CouponRepository.Class to save it in the date base .
CreateCoupon(HttpSession, Coupon) - Method in class CouponSystemProjectJB.CoupoSystemFinalProject.webServices.CompanyWebService
Create Coupon A method that receives a coupon (JSON) from client in the Request Body and the client details by the current Session - and creates a Coupon In the DB using the CompanyServiceImplantion.class
